comments:
After setting a RC1 workspace using the RC1a Callisto update site, I got this error in the .log file when trying to get the analysis menu for a java project.

Could not create action delegate for id: org.eclipse.tptp.platform.analysis.core.ui.internal.actions.OpenAnalysisConfigurations

The cause of this failure seems to be:
